p: This paper is taken from IV M.Sc. under the official direction of HM and MSL. HM, MSL, JBe, JBo, AR, and LB conceived the study and obtained the funding. All authors participated in the drafting of the manuscript. AR participated to designing the genetic tests and providing the seed. MSL and his team have installed three weather stations for the acquisition of environmental variables and conducted mineral analyses. IV performed the measurements of different variables, the analysis and the interpretation of data. All authors read and approved the final version of the manuscript.
